name: Krazy Mazes
overview: From A.N.A.L.O.G. magazine issue 71 published in April 1989. Krazy Mazes features two different kinds of competitive maze games. In the first screen, you and another player have a maze to navigate, with the first crossing the maze winning. To make it difficult periodically large "ghost" creatures will cross the maze; if the ghost is the same color as your player color and touches you, you will be sent back to the beginning. In the second screen there is a larger full screen maze that both players are placed on. As you move through the maze you touch dots which then disappear and give you points; the screen is finished when all dots are consumed. Touching the other player does nothing, so it is a straight forward race to the most points.
